relatedBlades.title: Externa packages
relatedBlades.copy:
Protect your public-facing systems with Externa packages. These plans provide enterprise-grade reliability and security, backed by a 100% uptime guarantee and 24/7 support.

With Externa, you get:

- No attack traffic tax
- Simple, value-driven pricing
- A seamless on-ramp to Interna (SASE)

relatedBlades.title: Accelerate and secure your apps, APIs, and network connectivity

plan.description: Foundational security controls for applications combined with optimal routing to deliver the fastest web experiences.

features.name: IP-based rate limiting (Rate Limiting)
features.description:
__Traffic volume control based on IP address:__
Limit the number of HTTP requests to apps and APIs made over a set timeframe from each IP address. Reduce web server overloads from volumetric attacks, like credential stuffing, DDoS, and brute force attacks.

features.name: Bot Management

__Detect and respond to bots:__

columnContent.title: No attack traffic tax
columnContent.description: You shouldn't be penalized for being attacked. Only pay for clean traffic, not the malicious requests we block. Cloudflare delivers predictable costs, even during a DDoS attack.

contentfulAsset.description: Icon of a hand offering help

columnContent.title: Simple, value-driven price units
columnContent.description: Say goodbye to origin fetch fees, duplicate charges per request, and charges per WAF rule or ACL. Our pricing scales directly with the value you receive.

columnContent.title: Simplified connectivity costs
columnContent.description: Connect your architecture to Cloudflare and deploy private interconnects to your clouds and data centers at zero cost.

columnContent.title: Seamless architectural continuity
columnContent.description: Every Cloudflare data center runs all Externa services, ensuring a smooth, hassle-free progression as you add features  no need for architectural changes or traffic rerouting.

columnContent.title: On-ramp to SASE included
columnContent.description: Every Externa package includes 50 Interna Essentials seats, extending security to internal systems for 360-degree security across your organization.

columnContent.title: Quantum-safe encryption
columnContent.description: Cloudflare has deployed post-quantum hybrid key agreement to encrypt your traffic and data and protect against  post-quantum cryptography (PQC) attacks.

featureLists.title: Success packages
featureLists.description: Maximize your Cloudflare experience with expedited support SLAs, value optimization, and more

supplementaryCallToAction.elementName: Solutions packages - Enterprise - Recommended - Success packages - Link

featureLists.title: Professional services
featureLists.description: Get expert advice and assistance to plan for and accelerate your Cloudflare deployment

supplementaryCallToAction.elementName: Solutions packages - Enterprise - Recommended - Professional Services - Link

featureLists.title: Ongoing support services
featureLists.description: Choose from technical and security operations add-ons

featureLists.title: Application performance
featureLists.description: Choose from several high-performance add-ons  designed for organizations that face application latency and uptime issues during high-traffic periods.

iconAssetFile.altText: Performance intelligent routing blue orange background
iconAssetFile.title: Performance intelligent routing blue orange background

contentfulAsset.description: Performance intelligent routing blue orange background

iconAssetFile.altText: Globe and geokey icon orange background
iconAssetFile.title: Globe and geokey icon orange background

contentfulAsset.description: Globe and geokey icon orange background

featureLists.title: Application security
featureLists.description: Choose from several high-security add-ons  designed for organizations that need to protect critical web applications and APIs from threats.

iconAssetFile.altText: ip truncation tile icon orange background
iconAssetFile.title: ip truncation tile icon orange background

contentfulAsset.description: ip truncation tile icon orange background

columnContent.title: 24/7 email and phone support
columnContent.description: Award-winning, global, 24/7/365 email and emergency phone support (for Enterprise plans). Get on-demand resources, guides, and best-practice implementation tips.

columnContent.title: Massive network scale
columnContent.description: Our global network spans over 330 cities and 120 countries. Operating within approximately 50 milliseconds of about 95% of the Internet-connected population globally.

columnContent.title: Ease of use and guided setup
columnContent.description: The Cloudflare dashboard enables quick configuration  no code changes required. Enterprise plan holders get guided onboarding, training, and continued 24/7/365 support.

columnContent.title: 100% uptime
columnContent.description: Enterprise plan holders get exclusive network prioritization  backed by dependable SLAs, 100% uptime, and reliable service you can trust.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by the world's biggest brands
relatedBlades.copy: ~35% of Fortune 1000 companies  rely on Cloudflare

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
<style>
